review_text: This serum is amazing! My skin feels so hydrated and plump. Definitely worth the price.
A very gentle cleanser, perfect for my sensitive skin. It cleans well without drying out my face.
I've noticed a visible difference in my skin's brightness after using this moisturizer for a few weeks. Love it!
It's an okay toner. It does help with breakouts but can be a bit drying if used too often.
This night cream is very soothing and rich. Great for nighttime routine, especially during harmattan.
Best sunscreen ever! It's mineral, reef-safe and doesn't leave a white cast on my skin. Perfect for Lagos sun.
Good retinol serum, starting to see some improvements in my skin texture. Remember to use sunscreen!
